毀.definition: to destroy; to ruin; to defame; to slander

毀三觀.definition: (Internet slang) (of a situation, video clip etc) to make one think "wtf!"

毀壞.definition: to damage; to devastate; to vandalize; damage; destruction

毀家紓難.definition: to sacrifice one's wealth to save the state (idiom)

毀容.definition: to disfigure; to spoil the beauty of

毀於一旦.definition: (idiom) ruined in a short time (esp. of sth that took a long time or great effort to achieve)

毀滅.definition: to perish; to ruin; to destroy

毀約.definition: to break a promise; breach of contract

毀謗.definition: slander; libel; to malign; to disparage

毀譽參半.definition: (idiom) to receive both praise and criticism; to get mixed reviews
